The pure class interface. 
public static abstract class State
  extends FormState
The abstract class of text form states.

TextForm.State()

addToHistory(String)
Add the given string to the history
confirmText(Session, Locator, Object)
Confirm the text contained in the state
getExternFile(Session)
Return a file for external editing of this text, or null if this feature shall not be
getText(Session)
Get the text contained in this state.
hasHistory(Session)
Return true if this text state provides a history
setDraftText(Session, String)
stepHistory(Session, boolean)
Step through history of this text state

TextForm.State
public TextForm.State();

getText
public abstract String getText(Session session);
Get the text contained in this state.

setDraftText

public abstract boolean setDraftText(Session session,
                                     String text);

confirmText

public void confirmText(Session session,
                        Locator locator,
                        Object source)
  throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
Confirm the text contained in the state. May throw to indicate that the contained text last set by setDraftText is invalid. By default, this method assumes the contained text is correct and issues a notifyChange() call.

hasHistory

public boolean hasHistory(Session session);
Return true if this text state provides a history. By default, returns false.

stepHistory

public boolean stepHistory(Session session,
                           boolean advance);
Step through history of this text state. Returns true if a previous or next item exists in the history. Provides a default implementation for history which is activated by letting hasHistory return true.

addToHistory

public void addToHistory(String string);
Add the given string to the history. This should be performed by confirmText, if this state wants to have a history.

getExternFile

public File getExternFile(Session session);
Return a file for external editing of this text, or null if this feature shall not be provided. By default returns null.
